title: Senior DevOops Engineer @ WinAdmins
comment:
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ 10/10 – A Must-Have Resource for Intune Admins! Highly recommended for any IT admin looking to bring consistency, security, and efficiency to their Intune environment.

Bookmark it—you’ll be coming back often.

title: 64.1470° N, 21.9408° W
comment: Finding the OIB felt like scoring a rad mixtape back in the day—full of primo tracks (or in this case, security settings) that made everything else sound, well, dated and out of sync.

title: Senior EUC Consultant @ Large MSP
comment:
I can easily recommend these policies to my customers as a baseline. They are easy to implement and provide a good starting point while maintaining a balance between security and user experience.

Overall, they're great!

title: Head of Cloud Strategy
comment: The quickest route to becoming more secure than what any other framework provides, without sacrificing productivity or usability.

title: Cyber Automation Architect @ MSSP
comment: OpenIntuneBaseline gave me a solid platform to build from for my endpoints. The project is clearly made by someone who understands Intune extremely well and the policy design is clearly laid out. Not only does it cover security measures, it also adds user experience policies too (especially Edge policies - which makes transition of Chrome much smoother).

title: Endpoint Architect @ Energy Firm
comment: This is so helpful and saves tons of hours. Really a big help!

title: Senior Solutions Architect
comment: As an IT consultant, every time I have engaged with the customers to secure their devices I use OIB.

title: Tech Lead Modern Workspace @ IT Solutions Provider
comment: The best policies and we used it for our baselines!
